name: Pious Expanse
description:
In Pious Expanse fly through space, upgrading your planets to make them more and more religious! Trade this religion for crystals, allowing you to buy more planets as well as change your in game look.

Controls

  • WASD / arrow keys - move
  • Return - Buy / Upgrade
  • E - Toggle Shop
  • M - Toggle Minimap
  • ESC - Pause game
